amendment.description: To repeal the 1993 income tax increase on Social Security benefits and to offset the revenue loss.

action.text: Amendment SA 556 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 556 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 149.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 556.
Amendment SA 556 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S6154-6157; text: CR S6154-6155) To repeal the 1993 income tax increase on Social Security benefits and to offset the revenue loss.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 556 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 149.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 556 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
